body: This belt functions as a plague rat belt, except it grants the wearer a +2 enhancement bonus to Dexterity and Constitution. Treat this as a temporary ability bonus for the first 24 hours the belt is worn.
name: Plague Rat Belt, Greater
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Belt/Belt Slot Wondrous Items/Plague Rat Belt/Greater
